function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased physical activity in public spaces may lead to greater risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal settlements and urban poor may not have access to safe physical activity options at home","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines on safe physical activity outdoors during a pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Shift to unhealthy processed food consumption due to lack of nutritional guidelines for food parcels to the poor","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interrupted access to food for children from households that depend on school-feeding programmes due to school closures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staggering loss of jobs and livelihoods leading to financial challenges in affording healthy foods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of routine physical activity due to stay-at-home orders and curfew measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exacerbation of unhealthy food consumption, physical inactivity, and sedentary behavior due to covid-19 control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Threatened food supply and increased food insecurity due to covid-19-related closures of national borders","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of nutritional knowledge, cooking skills, and guidelines for ensuring nutritional quality of food parcels to the poor","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air exhaust outlets leading to deposition of virus-laden droplets on equipment such as vents","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Operational limitations during an outbreak leading to inconsistent methodology and small sample size","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited air sampling volume and dilution of airborne sars-cov-2 in the room","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning of environmental surfaces in healthcare facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental contamination with sars-cov-2 in patient rooms and facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral shedding in stool as a potential route of transmission for sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Nosocomial transmission of sars-cov-2 due to environmental contamination","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain mode of transmission and extent of environmental contamination","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of specific cleaning chemicals in routine cleaning","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographic spread of west nile virus and lyme disease","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Effect of climate change on vbds","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Urban and suburban planning and vbd risk","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergence and re-emergence of tick-and mosquito-borne diseases in canada due to climate change","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vector-borne diseases responding differently to long-term changes in temperature and rainfall patterns","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergence and spread of new mosquito-borne and tick-borne pathogens in canada due to climate change","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantive discrimination in layoffs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Industry-specific variation in layoff probabilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher susceptibility to covid-19 among immigrants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disparities in vaccination rates among immigrant groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in covid-19 risk and mortality among immigrant groups based on region of origin","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases due to increased interaction in the labor market","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Training gap for migrants leading to potential vulnerability in adapting to new jobs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of school closures on the school-to-work transition for the children of immigrants","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disproportionately negative impact of the pandemic on immigrants’ labor market outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stronger negative impact on migrant youth in the labor market","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact on immigrants in declining industries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Immigrant participation gap in training and skills development","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher training needs for immigrants in occupations at risk of automation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of pandemic on learning outcomes of children of immigrants","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Severe problems for newly arrived migrant and refugee children","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Scant evidence on long-term effects such as school disengagement for children of immigrants","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overrepresentation of students from socio-economically disadvantaged backgrounds","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Language barriers and difficulties of foreign-born parents in guiding children through host-country curricula","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of data on educational attainment of children of immigrants during the impact of pandemic on educational outcomes of children of immigrants","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Decreased immigration and emigration of previous immigrants","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Weak labor market attachment for refugees and family migrants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in use of posted workers during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in labour market participation of immigrant men and women","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
